comment: Indeed. I'm going to post a chart of the Polytheistic deities later from the different cultures and languages since they all worship the same gods and goddess. EDIT: I really don't care what name they attach to them either since they're all the same character.
amr:
# ::snt Indeed. I'm going to post a chart of the Polytheistic deities later from the different cultures and languages since they all worship the same gods and goddess. EDIT: I really don't care what name they attach to them either since they're all the same character.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / indeed)
      :snt2 (p / post-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (c / chart-01
                  :ARG1 (d / deity
                        :mod (p2 / polytheistic))
                  :source (a / and
                        :op1 (c2 / culture)
                        :op2 (l / language)
                        :ARG1-of (d2 / differ-02)))
            :time (a2 / after)
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (w / worship-01
                        :ARG0 (t / they
                              :mod (a3 / all))
                        :ARG1 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (g / god)
                              :op2 (g2 / god
                                    :mod (g3 / goddess))
                              :ARG1-of (s / same-01)))))
      :snt3 (c4 / care-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (n / name
                  :ARG1-of (a5 / attach-01
                        :ARG0 t
                        :ARG2 (c5 / character
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / same-01)
                              :mod (a6 / all))))
            :ARG1-of (r / real-04)
            :ARG1-of (c6 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 c5)
            :mod (e / either)
            :ARG1-of (e2 / edit-01)))
